original_text: The reason the dream was given to Pharaoh in two forms is that the matter has been firmly decided by God, and God will do it soon.
korean_text: 바로께서 꿈을 두 번 겹쳐 꾸신 것은 하나님이 이 일을 정하셨음이라 하나님이 속히 행하시리니

sentences.original_text: The reason the dream was given to Pharaoh in two forms
sentences.korean_translation: 꿈이 바로에게 두 가지 형태로 주어진 이유는

sentences.original_text: is that the matter has been firmly decided by God
sentences.korean_translation: 그 일이 하나님에 의해 굳게 결정되었다는 것입니다

sentences.original_text: and God will do it soon
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 하나님께서 곧 그것을 행하실 것입니다
